dcterms:creator: J. Hsu
J. Gu
G. Wu
W. Chiu
S. Yeung
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of 120 volumes inspired by cryo-electron tomography images, containing a three-level structure representing biological cells, vesicles, mitochondria, and protein aggregates. The dataset includes regular and irregular variants with randomized intensities and locations of objects, while maintaining the hierarchy.
dcterms:title: Biologically Inspired Synthetic Datasets

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
A. Jakab
S. Bauer
J. Kalpathy-Cramer
K. Farahani
J. Kirby
Y. Burren
N. Porz
J. Slotboom
R. Wiest
dcterms:description: An established benchmark for 3D tumor segmentation of brain MRIs, featuring co-registered volumes, interpolated to (1mm)³ resolution, and brain-extracted images. The dataset is used for evaluating unsupervised segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: BraTS’19 Dataset
